scripts.copy-f7: cpy node_modules/framework7/js/*.* www/libs/framework7/js && cpy node_modules/framework7/css/*.* www/libs/framework7/css && cpy node_modules/vue/dist/*.* www/libs/vue/ && cpy node_modules/framework7-icons/fonts/*.* www/libs/framework7-icons/fonts && cpy node_modules/framework7-icons/css/*.* www/libs/framework7-icons/css && cpy node_modules/material-design-icons/iconfont/*.{eot,ttf,woff,woff2} www/fonts && cpy node_modules/requirejs/require.js www/libs/requirejs
